name: John Parkers
description: I am a kind and caring person who is very affectionate. I love to laugh and make others smile. I usually wear my heart on my sleeve and I love hugs and holding hands. Life is really only the blink of an eye and it is up to us to make the most of it. Things are just that and can be re-placed but respect and love shared between two people is irreplaceable and something you can’t put a price tag on
